author: narl_14
content: Thanks! Would you be able to share some example where it is rollup operated and completely decentralised? Would love to go through their documentation

author: treyzania
content: Most rollups at the moment just have a centralized sequencer, except Fuel I think?  I don't know if Arbitrum finished their upgrade yet.  But here read this: https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/01/05/rollup.html
